name: Fancy Cake Decoration
description:
In this game you have to prepare a cake for your friend's birthday. We are not so good in making cakes, so we need you.

The cake will have three floors and each floor and cream you will have to choose or what bakery items to put on it. First, you must choose the cake base. You can choose a countertop made of chocolate, vanilla, strawberry, cherry, kiwi and banana. After you choose the cake dough and much more.

Decorate birthday cake for your friends and celebrate with.

Features:
=======
- Easy user interface.
- So many decoration items.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for this? Download Now...
